full_description: Title: Business Analyst/Data/Product Owner/Market Data/Capital Markets Client: Mayfair Capital Duration: 1 year+ Rate: $75/hr on C2C Required Location: Hybrid/Midtown New York City 3 days a week. Interview Required: Video Candidate Visa’s Accepted: USC, GC Candidates must be LOCAL to the NEW YORK or NEW JERSEY area and COMMUTE into the office THREE TIMES A WEEK. NO RELOCATION CONSIDERED. Financial Markets Data Analyst – Information Technology Group
